subject: Evaluation procedure of bids received from Consultancy firms for DPR preparation.
text: HTrrf4 <4f4 <TTHT gifererot TM Phone 91-1+-25074100/25074200 (7 4ar7l, 45v 4R4ET 3 TTTTTT 7A1T4) IFax 91-11-25093507 25093514 M TT7 National Highways Authority of India WFA, /Extn. 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport arid Highways) #-5W 6, 7R7-10, EHT_ 7 frf-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/21/2005-Admn December 7 2005 POLICY CIRCUAR: ADMNSTRATIONFINANCE (111 /2005) (Decision taken on BOT Division file No. NHAIIBOTILOT-V/2005) Sub: Evaluation procedure of bids received from Consultancy firms for DPR preparation: The current practice of evaluation procedure of DPR bids based on lowest cost criteria has been reviewed by the Competent Authority in NHAI It has now been decided that in order to enhance the quality of preparation of DPR all fulure DPR proposals may be evaluated n QCBS System instead of Lowest Cost Criteria. 2 This supersedes all the guideiines issued so far covering the above aspects. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority- (G.P.
